1.text: Wet the inside of your cup with cold water, then pour out the excess.

2.text: Sprinkle about 1/4 cup (45 g) of baking soda into the cup.

3.text: Turn the cup sideways and rotate it to spread the baking soda evenly.

4.text: Let the baking soda sit in place for about 30 minutes.

5.text: Use a soft cloth or sponge to scrub the baking soda gently into the cup.

7.text: Pour 1–2 US tbsp (15–30 mL) of vinegar inside of your cup.

8.text: Coat the sides of the cup with about 1/2 tsp (3 g) of salt.

9.text: Allow the salt to sit for about 5 minutes.

10.text: Scrub the salt into the cup with a soft cloth or a sponge.
